verse: त्वं भज हिरण्यगर्भं त्वमपि हरं त्वञ्च तत्परं ब्रह्म । विनिहितकृष्णानंदामहन्तु वृन्दाटवीं वन्दे ॥
overall_meaning: I salute You, worshiping the golden-wombed Hiranyagarbha, You who are also Hari (Vishnu), and You who are the ultimate Brahman. May the bliss of Krishna bestow blessings upon the grove of Vrindavan.
